items.name: Cheap coffee maker
items.description: Compact, simple, and budget-friendly, it brews a perfect cup in minutes. Your morning ritual just got more economical.

items.name: Premium Coffee Maker
items.description: Where coffee becomes an art form. Precision, customization, and premium design for a coffee experience like no other.

items.name: Coffee Grinder
items.description: Grind your own coffee beans and experience a whole new level of freshness.

items.name: Coffee Scale
items.description: The perfect cup of coffee requires precision. This scale helps you measure the right amount of coffee beans and water.

items.name: Coffee Bean Canister
items.description: Keep your coffee beans fresh with this stainless steel canister. The vacuum seal keeps oxygen out and the built-in calendar wheel helps you track the freshness of your beans.

items.name: Coffee Filter
items.description: Specially designed for your coffee maker, this filter ensures that you get the perfect cup of coffee every time.

items.name: Coffee Mug
items.description: The perfect vessel for your coffee. The double-walled glass keeps your coffee warm and your hands cool.

items.name: Coffee Spoon
items.description: The perfect spoon to measure your coffee. The long handle lets you reach into the bottom of the bag and the clip keeps your coffee fresh.

items.name: Cheap Nescafe Beans
items.description: Budget-friendly coffee beans. Enjoy the rich taste of Nescafe without the premium price tag. Perfect for daily sips without breaking the bank.

items.name: Premium Coffee Beans
items.description: Hand-selected from the world's finest regions, these beans deliver a truly luxurious coffee experience. Each cup is a journey into the world of exquisite flavors and aromas. Elevate your coffee ritual with our premium beans.

items.name: Cheap Nescafe Ground Coffee
items.description: Affordable coffee essential. Experience the classic Nescafe taste without the hefty price. Ideal for everyday brewing, it's the budget-savvy choice for your coffee fix.

items.name: Premium Ground Coffee
items.description: The epitome of coffee excellence. Sourced from the world's finest beans and expertly ground, it elevates your coffee experience to a whole new level. With exceptional flavor and aroma, each cup is a testament to the art of coffee.

items.name: Cheap Instant Coffee
items.description: Affordable instant coffee fix. Enjoy the convenience and classic coffee taste without the premium cost.

items.name: Premium Instant Coffee
items.description: The pinnacle of instant coffee luxury. Crafted from the world's finest coffee beans, it redefines your instant coffee experience with unmatched flavor and aroma.
